content: How to scope/limit access to some Qs to providers and others to subjects/patient if all stored on a central repo?
I think that is outside the questionnaire (or at most an extension) and should be a part of the host application that renders the form.
so a Smart scopes question? by a security tag on Q?
The simplest is to have a question at the beginning that asks the user to self-identify their category, then have enableWhens on subsequent questions that are driven by the answer to that question.
My question is more about access to the Questionnaire on a FHIR Server. I think is more of a scopes question.
You could do it with Security Labels I suppose
